itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the Final Four match-ups and who will be NCAA champion, as well as predict every single MLB divisional winner, MVP winners, Cy Young Winners and Roookie Of The Year for this upcoming baseball season.  They also make "Way Too Early" World Series predictions for October.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the Final Four match-ups and who will be NCAA champion, as well as predict every single MLB divisional winner, MVP winners, Cy Young Winners and Roookie Of The Year for this upcoming baseball season.  They also make "Way Too Early" World Series predictions for October.
